TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCellCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

Docs.summary: Stores legend cells in a LegendCellCollection object.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Add (System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment);

.method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment) cil managed

Docs.param: A value representing the cell type.
A value that represents either the cell text or its image name, depending on the value of the `cellType` parameter.
A value that represents the cell content alignment.
Docs.summary: Adds a legend cell with the specified cell type, text and alignment to the end of the collection.
Docs.returns: An value that represents the index of the newly added legend cell in the collection. The index is zero-based.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment);

.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType cellType, string text, valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment alignment) cil managed

Docs.param: Index of the location to insert the object.
A value that represents the cell type.
A value that represents either the cell text or its image name, depending on the value of the `cellType` parameter.
A enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend cell content.
Docs.summary: Inserts a legend cell with the specified cell type, text and alignment into the collection at a given location.
